documentation.text:
@title USDs Strategies abstract contract
 @author Sperax Foundation
@dev Verifies that the caller is the Vault.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Caller is not the Vault or owner"

arguments.value: Caller is not the Vault or owner

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Caller is not the Vault or owner"

documentation.text: @dev Verifies that the caller is the Vault or owner.

@dev Set the reward token address.
 @param _rewardTokenAddress Address of the reward token
@dev Collect accumulated reward token and send to Vault.

@dev Get the amount reward earned
 @return rewardEarned    The amount reward earned

checkBalance(address).details: Get the total asset value held in the platform.      This includes any interest that was generated since depositing.

returns.balance: Total value of the asset in the platform

collectInterest(address,address).details: Withdraw the interest earned of asset from the platform.

params._recipient: Address to which the asset should be sent

collectRewardToken().details: Collect accumulated reward token and send to Vault.

deposit(address,uint256).details: Deposit an amount of asset into the platform

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

removePToken(uint256).details: Remove a supported asset by passing its index.      This method can only be called by the system owner

params._assetIndex: Index of the asset to be removed

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setPTokenAddress(address,address).details: Provide support for asset by passing its pToken address.      This method can only be called by the system owner

params._pToken: Address for the corresponding platform token

supportsCollateral(address).details: Check if an asset/collateral is supported.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdraw(address,address,uint256).details: Withdraw an amount of asset from the platform.

params._recipient: Address to which the asset should be sent

withdrawToVault(address,uint256).details: Withdraw an amount of asset from the platform to vault

rewardTokenAddress.details: The address of the reward token for the Strategy.
